title: Katie Price's children Junior and Princess stay at dad Peter Andre's spotless house
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Katie Price's children Junior, 14, and Princess, 12, seem to be enjoying the clean surroundings their father's house offers.

The siblings have been seen having a nice time in the company of their dad Peter Andre as they kick back and relax in his gleaming abode that he shares with his second wife Emily MacDonagh in a snap and footage Peter, 46, uploaded onto Instagram on Tuesday.

As the children pose with their father, in the selfie that sees the trio beaming, they snuggle up together in his spick and span living room.

The clip gives more insight into the stunning Surrey mansion as Junior shows off his rapping in the short video as he stands in Peter and Doctor Emily's immaculate dining room.

(Image: Instagram)

The beautiful communal area boasts a sparkling table, plush velvet seats as well as glistening patio doors.

Peter's place - that gives Instagram cleaning sensation Mrs Hinch's home a run for its money - is worlds away from his ex Katie's mucky mansion that she has given a tour of in her latest YouTube video.

The 41-year-old former glamour model's Horsham home is covered in mess, with bird poo on the floor and stacks of underwear and clothes everywhere.

(Image: Instagram)

There is graffiti on the walls and no furniture as she gets the property renovated by a team of builders.

Katie admits in the video that her house is a mess, saying that just thinking about sorting through all her clutter gives her a "headache".

Her vlog starts with the mum-of-five going into one of her stables, which instead of horses is just full of piles of clothes.

In the doorway is a big pile of bird poo and she looks up to find that birds have made a mess there.

Katie says: "Instead of a horse there seems like there's some bird s***."

(Image: Youtube)

(Image: Youtube)

Cobwebs cover the ceilings and her clothes litter the floor, which she plans to sell on eBay.

While she doesn't show them, Katie also says there are nine garages in total that are "full of c**p."

Katie and Pete split in 2009 after tying the knot in 2005.

Following their divorce Peter married Emily and the couple share two children Theodore, two, and Amelia, five.

(Image: PA)

Katie went on to marry Alex Reid in 2010 but then their marriage ended in 2012.

She then went on to wed Kieran Hayler the following year but the pair, who have two children Jett and Bunny, are now finalising their divorce.

The busty star is now dating personal trainer Kris Boyson.
description: The two children seem to be having a nice time staying at their dad's sparkling abode which is worlds away from their mum's mucky mansion
